content: I won't speculate as to the "reason" for this tragedy, only point out a few facts. Those who serve in our military are representative of our society in general. They range from the highest caliber to the dregs who joined to avoid incarceration, most intelligent to the not so bright, most even keeled to the borderline irrational. There are hundreds of thousands who have handled the stress of multiple combat tours and those who have lost it in their first few weeks in the Green Zone. The point is not to assign blame, but to try to help all of our volunteers to cope with their own demons.

content: I won't speculate as to the "reason" for this tragedy, only point out a few facts. Those who serve in our military are representative of our society in general. They range from the highest caliber to the dregs who joined to avoid incarceration, most intelligent to the not so bright, most even keeled to the borderline irrational. There are hundreds of thousands who have handled the stress of multiple combat tours and those who have lost it in their first few weeks in the Green Zone. The point is not to assign blame, but to try to help all of our volunteers to cope with their own demons.
